sentences: Simon Andrew David Fox (born 12 July 1949) is an English rock drummer, who played in different rock bands during the 1970s and the 1980s, most notably the progressive rock group Be-Bop Deluxe.
After Be-Bop Deluxe, he played in Trevor Rabin's band, touring with them in Britain.
Later, he played on Jack Green's Reverse Logic, released in 1981.

In 1988, he joined Orkestra (a post-Electric Light Orchestra band formed by bassist Kelly Groucutt and violinist Mik Kaminski), releasing with them two albums, Beyond the Dream and Roll Over Beethoven.
